code:
# @param {String} s1
# @param {String} s2
# @return {Boolean}
def check_strings(s1, s2)
    # Separate characters by even and odd indices for both strings
    s1_even, s1_odd, s2_even, s2_odd = '', '', '', ''
    s1.chars.each_with_index do |char, index|
        if index.even?
            s1_even << char
        else
            s1_odd << char
        end
    end

    s2.chars.each_with_index do |char, index|
        if index.even?
            s2_even << char
        else
            s2_odd << char
        end
    end

    # Sort the characters to check if permutations match for even and odd separately
    return s1_even.chars.sort == s2_even.chars.sort && s1_odd.chars.sort == s2_odd.chars.sort
end
